text: Granulifusus rubrolineatus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. These snails have been found of the eastern and southeastern coasts of South Africa ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1870
title: Granulifusus rubrolineatus
